settings.title: Settings
settings.nearbyShareEnabledDesc: Enable quick file sharing on this network
settings.nearbyShareAnnonDesc: Display my name and photo when using NearbyShare
settings.resetSettingsDesc: Reset settings to the default values

login.title: Email sent
login.sentDesc: An email has been sent to the provided address!
notes: Open the email you received and follow the link to reset your password.
If you did not receive an email, either it has been marked as spam or no account exists with this email address.

welcome.title: Welcome!
intro: Let's check out what your new SkyShare account has to offer and some tips to improve your experience.

welcome.title: New features
welcome.historyDesc: All the files you send and receive with SkyShare will be saved on the history for one month
welcome.syncDesc: SkyShare will sync your transfer history across all the devices using your account to always stay up to date
welcome.identificationDesc: When people receive files from you, your name will be displayed next to the files (can be enabled on settings)

account.title: History
account.historyDisabled: You don't have history enabled on your account, please enable it on your account settings.
account.historyEmpty: This space feels a bit empty, send or receive some files and come back here later!

account.title: Edit Account
account.enableHistoryDesc: Save new entries to the transfer history

account.title: Delete Account
account.confirmDesc: By deleting your account, you will lose some features exclusive to members!
list: You will no longer be able to access your transfer history and it won't sync across devices.
You will no longer be identified with name and photo when making transfers.

account.deleting: Deleting your SkyShare account, hang on tight!

modal.disabledDesc: An operation is currently running, you may only close SkyShare once it's finished!
modal.offlineDesc: There was an error while trying to reach the internet, make sure you're online and you have a stable connection.
modal.miscommunicationDesc: An unknown error occurred while trying to reach the server, this likely happened cause you're running an outdated version of the application. Please make sure you're running the latest version and try again.
modal.invalidUsernameDesc: The username should only contain letters, numbers or "." "-" "_".
modal.invalidEmailDesc: The provided email address isn't valid, please check if you typed it correctly and try again.
modal.invalidPasswordDesc: The provided password should be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
modal.invalidNewUsernameDesc: Your new username should only contain letters, numbers or "." "-" "_".
modal.invalidNewEmailDesc: Your new email address isn't valid, please check if you typed it correctly and try again.
modal.invalidNewPasswordDesc: Your new password should be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one number, one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
modal.wrongUserPassDesc: The username or password entered are incorrect, please try again.
modal.usernameUnavailableDesc: This username is already in use, please choose another one.
modal.emailUnavailableDesc: This email is already in use, please use another one.
modal.unknownSignupDesc: An unknown error occurred while trying to create your SkyShare account, please try again later.
modal.invalidVerificationTokenDesc: This token is not valid, make sure you're logged in on the right account and try again.
modal.invalidRecoveryTokenDesc: It appears that the recovery token from the email you received does not match the one stored, please request a new password reset.
modal.unknownEditDesc: An unknown error occurred while trying save your new account informations, please try again later.
modal.unknownPasswordDesc: An unknown error occurred while trying to change your password, please try again later.
modal.unknownHistoryDesc: An unknown error occurred while trying to manage your history, please try again later.
modal.messageTooLongDesc: The message exceeded the maximum length, please try again with a shorter message.
modal.photoTooBigDesc: The selected photo is bigger than 3 MB, please choose a smaller one.
modal.invalidPhotoDesc: The selected photo is not in one of the allowed formats.
modal.tooManyFilesDesc: The maximum number of files has been exceeded! You can only send a maximum of 20 files per transfer.
modal.sizeLimitExceededDesc: The total file size must not exceed 15 GB.
modal.fileWithSameNameDesc: An error occurred while adding {{num}} of the selected files as there's already files with those names.
nearbyShareDesc: With this feature enabled, when you have the receive page open, your device will be discovered by other people on the same network.
When someone on your network is sending files, a list of people with the NearbyShare feature on will be shown providing quick transfers without the need of sharing the transfer code.
Your info will not be shared on the network unless you have a SkyShare account and you opt-in using the "Show my info" switch.
modal.noUpdatesDesc: You already have the latest version of SkyShare. That's great news!
betaUpdatesDesc: Are you sure you want to enable this setting? Beta updates are unstable and can break your user experience.
You will have to restart SkyShare for this setting to be applied.
modal.resetSettingsDesc: Are you sure you want to reset all settings? The default values will be applied.
modal.confirmModalRecoveryDesc: Please confirm your password to finish recovering your account:
modal.accountRecoveredDesc: Your account has successfully been recovered! You may now log in with your new password.
modal.confirmPasswordSignupDesc: Please confirm your password to finish creating your account:
modal.verifySuccessDesc: Your email has been verified successfully!
modal.logoutDesc: Are you sure you want to log out?
modal.passwordNotMatchDesc: The passwords you entered do not match, please try again.
modal.passwordSuccessDesc: Your password has been successfully changed!
modal.accountVerifyDesc: It's recommended that you verify your account email address. Do you want SkyShare to resend the email?
modal.accountDeleteDesc: Please confirm the deletion by typing your password again:
modal.accountDeleteConfirmDesc: Deleting your account will erase all your data in a irreversible way! Once you press on the button below, the deletion process will start.
modal.deleteSuccessDesc: Your account has been successfully deleted. We hope to see you again soon!
modal.historyClearDesc: Are you sure you want to clear all entries from your transfer history?
